title: Apple macOS AMDRadeonX4000_AMDAccelResource Integer Overflow Information Disclosure Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to disclose sensitive information on vulnerable installations of Apple macOS. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the handling of the AMDRadeonX4000_AMDAccelResource method. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of user-supplied data, which can result in an integer overflow before reading from memory. An attacker can leverage this in conjunction with other vulnerabilities to escalate privileges in the context of the kernel.
addtionnal_details: Apple has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT209600
timeline:
2019-03-08 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2019-06-13 - Coordinated public release of advisory
credit: Lilang Wu and Moony Li of TrendMicro Mobile Security Research Team
